item.description:
Josh Dion from Lost in The Beer Aisle is throwing a Tweet-up at Cambridge Brewing Company on Saturday, the 27th.

I figured this was a great chance to get some meetup folks there as well, to mingle with other beer lovers who happen to be tech savvy, too.

Here's more details:

The Boston craft beer tweet-up is a FREE social networking event intended for anyone who loves beer. Many of the attendees will be from the Boston-area beer blogging community as well as beer-lovers from Twitter. The event will be casual. No agenda. Come, drink, talk beer, make friends. Bring your business card for a chance to win door prizes!!!

To get your FREE tickets, RSVP here. I snagged a total of 10 for our group!

As always, cheers!

-- Alicia
item.name: Boston Craft Beer Tweet-up
